mapper.sql: cc.id AS cc_id, cc.execute_rule_id AS cc_execute_rule_id, cc.title AS cc_title, cc.body AS cc_body, cc.randing_url AS cc_randing_url, cc.banner_img AS cc_banner_img, cc.poll_count AS cc_poll_count, cc.display AS cc_display, cc.status AS cc_status, cc.reg_dttm AS cc_reg_dttm, cc.up_dttm AS cc_up_dttm, ,
CAMPAIGN_CANDIDATE cc JOIN STAR s ON (cc.star_id = s.id AND s.display = true) JOIN USER u ON (cc.user_id = u.id)
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CAMPAIGN_CANDIDATE (execute_rule_id, star_id, user_id, title, body, randing_url, banner_img, poll_count, display, status, reg_dttm, up_dttm) VALUES (#{executeRuleId}, #{star.id}, #{user.id}, #{title}, #{body}, #{randingUrl}, #{bannerImg}, 0, true, 'SERVICE', NOW(), NOW());
mapper.update:
UPDATE CAMPAIGN_CANDIDATE SET
title = #{title},
body = #{body},
randing_url = #{randingUrl},
banner_img = #{bannerImg},
up_dttm = NOW() WHERE id = #{id} AND star_id = #{star.id}
UPDATE CAMPAIGN_CANDIDATE SET status = #{status}, up_dttm = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
